summary_comment: Professor Montgomery is an excellent instructor known for his engaging storytelling and practical insights into naval science. He is highly regarded for his humor and inspirational presence in the classroom, making learning both enjoyable and memorable. Students note that while the class can be straightforward with the right preparation, his enthusiasm and expertise are undeniable.
summary_comment_short: Professor Montgomery is an inspiring and engaging instructor, particularly noted for his captivating storytelling and practical insights as a pilot. He effectively combines humor with academic rigor, making the class both enjoyable and informative.

Ratings.comment: Wild Bill has the best stories and he's a pilot so that's pretty cool.  the class is pretty easy if you read the books and pay attention in class.
William Montgomery was inspiring in the field of naval science.  He also is a pilot. Which is is pretty cool.
Great teacher, inspirationAL man, hilarious and all around great person. Just remember your customs and courtesies!
